attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and took up too much space it deserves to be taken down
attributes.title: Laggy

attributes.review: The app lags a lot. Asks for personal information. Once I deleted the app I kept getting spam emails and phone calls.
attributes.title: Not worth it. Fake.

attributes.review: App took forever load. Kept on kicking me out too most of the times that it did load.
attributes.title: App doesn’t work

attributes.review: This app was a nightmare to use. Asked for way too much personal info and took forever to load. Can’t say it was useful at all.
attributes.title: Yikes 🧚

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I died and my house burned down. My parents have to pay for my funeral and the cost of a new house. Do not download this app. Pls. It’s absolute garbage
attributes.title: Absolute garbage

attributes.review: This app was so bad. Lots of “glitches”. You need to fix this. Some glitches I experienced was it saying racial slurs like “kungflu” and the “Chinese Virus”. 0/10 wouldn’t recommend.
attributes.title: Not my Presidential App

attributes.review: This app took forever to download for me was not helpful whatsoever and may have given my phone a virus plus this app isn’t even for Bernie so I don’t know why I had it 😒🙄
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Not only is this app laggy and a complete failure to all media kind, it hacks my phone and deletes data. delete this app from the app store immediately
attributes.title: An abomination

attributes.review: This app took 8 hours to download and once it did it wouldn’t even let me open it. Absolutely horrible.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: after downloading this app i had explosive diarrhea for a week from seeing all the crap on there, definitely do not recommend!!
attributes.title: AWFUL APP
